channel.title: [pi] not another pi problem : / [pi]
channel.description: Alright so this ones not in any guides (i checked) but its something that can be abused. Basically, after you use the saradomin godswords special, it always heals with every hit (after the special). Even after you switch weapons it still heals you. any ideas?? :3

item.title: [pi] not another pi problem : / [pi]
item.dc:creator: @King_Joe King Joe
item.description:
@King_Joe wrote:

Try going into playercombat.java and search the item codes

Not sure what depot your using but if itâ€™s 508-525 then this should be what saradomin sword looks like:

case 11730:
/**
* Saradomin sword
*/
p.requestAnim(7072, 0);
p.damageSpecDelay = 1;
p.enableSpecDamage = true;
isSpecWep = true;
break;

Read full topic
